note: Stanley Hanks is a musicologist, translator, singer, pianist and piano teacher. Born of American parents in Costa Rica. His two "mother tongues" are English and Spanish; he learned French in secondary school and German as a young adult. Stanley lived and worked for many years in Germany, then in France. He performs as a singer/songwriter, translates for other musicians, and gives piano lessons. His main line of work now consists in the correction of scientific articles for journal publication.
